Title: Memory Exposure in concat-stream
Description:
Versions of `concat-stream` is vulnerable to memory exposure if userp provided input is passed into `write()`

 are not affected due to not using unguarded Buffer constructor. 
Update to or later.

If you are unable to update make sure user provided input into the `write()` function is not a number.
AffectedVersions: all versions starting from 1.3.0 before 1.3.2, all versions starting from 1.4.0 before 1.4.11, all versions starting from from 1.5.0 before 1.5.2
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 1.3.2 before 1.4.0, all versions starting from 1.4.11 before 1.5.0, all versions starting from 1.5.2
